mapper.sql: id, remind_name, remind_content_time, remind_task_type, remind_cycle, remind_date_time, template_id, remind_person, remind_person_tel, remind_person_email, remind_status, gmt_create, gmt_modified

trim.where:
remind_task_type = #{remindTaskType ,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
remind_cycle = #{remindCycle ,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
remind_status = #{remindStatus ,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
1 = 1

mapper.select:
select
from aiinfo_remind_task_info
order by gmt_create desc
limit ${offset},${limit}
